name: Ludum Dare 45 - Dreamscaping
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 45.

Theme: "Start with nothing"

Emptyhead has realized their dreams are so boring because they're so empty, so in order to have better dreams they'll build one themselves.  Push and pull dream orbs together to form dreams and nightmares.  Dreams score points but block the way, and use up Emptyhead's energy, while nightmares regain it, too many will also wake them up.

Controls:

  • Z or controller face-buttons:  grab orbs
  • Arrow keys or directional pad/stick:  move Emptyhead
  • X key or Start button:  Quick start

All art, music, and programming done by myself during the game jam.  Only outside piece was Kenney's font "Kenney Pixel". I supported them; you should too!  https://kenney.itch.io/

Made in Godot 3.1.1
